snippet: After Ohio State went unbeaten in seven games with Cardale Jones at quarterback, Coach Urban Meyer went back to his former starter Barrett.
abstract: Marc Tracy On College Football column examines Ohio State coach Urban Meyer's decision to name quarterback J T Barrett as starter against Rutgers over redshirt junior Cardale Jones; Barrett was 14 for 18 with three touchdowns and ran for 101 yards in match-up.

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: After Ohio State went unbeaten in seven games with Cardale Jones at quarterback, Coach Urban Meyer went back to his former starter Barrett.

headline.print_headline: Buckeyes Pull Off a Switch, Smoothly
headline.main: With J.T. Barrett Back, the Buckeyes Don’t Miss a Beat
